ingredients: 5 pounds beef chuck, cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes
2 (28 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes, mashed
title: Chile Colorado II
instructions: Heat oil in a heavy bottomed pan over medium high heat. Dredge beef cubes in flour. Cook in hot oil until browned on all sides, reducing heat if necessary. Add tomatoes, green chilies, serrano chiles, onions, beer, water, cumin, salt, and pepper. Cover and simmer for 2 hours. Add chopped cilantro, and simmer 1 hour longer.
